feature_model.name: Feedback
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Feedback (Feedback) :m Tutoring (Tutoring) :m IntelligentTutoring (IntelligentTutoring) :m Advice (Advice) :o User_Authentication (User_Authentication) :o Result_Monitoring (Result_Monitoring) :g [1, *] : Instructor (Instructor) : Student (Student) :o Grading (Grading) :o Tutoring_lecture (Tutoring_lecture) :g [1, *] : tutoring_simulation2 (tutoring_simulation2) : tutoring_simulation (tutoring_simulation)
